title: Next Sehri in
context: Wake up early for Sehri and prayer.

title: Sehri Time
context: Make Niyyah and recite Sehri dua.

title: Sehri Time Over
context: Sehri has ended. Prepare for Fajr prayer.

title: Iftar in
context: Stay patient and focused during your fast.

title: Iftar Soon
context: Prepare for dua before breaking your fast.

title: Iftar Time
context: Complete Maghrib namaz, make iftar dua and break your fast.

title: Next Sehri in
context: Rest well and prepare for tomorrow.

title: Sehri Time Over
context: Make Niyyah and recite Sehri dua.

title: Iftar Time
context: Complete Maghrib namaz, then make iftar dua.

title: Fast Completed
context: Your fast has been marked completed.
